data.actual_result: Keyboard doesn't close and if you press space key, it scrolls down the list nicely.
data.expected_result: Clicking on any button should close the keyboard.
data.short_description: Clicking on any radio check box to enable it after adding a space in role name doesn't close the keyboard.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to any server settings>roles - Create a role, add a space in the role name and click check any box that's visible (allow anyone to mention this role or display role members separately) - Notice the keyboard stays open but no text field is on focus. - Click space.
